name: 林廷宇
objective:
主要以AE為核心，依案例再搭配其餘軟體輔助
1. 架構影片後期製作流程
2. 電腦動畫及視覺特效於影片後製作階段的應用
3. 學習合成與剪接的概念與技巧
4. 暸解最新動畫影視特效趨勢及發展
5. 培養後期製作專案提案與執行能力
1. To construct a post-production project
2. To apply animation and visual effects to post-production works
3. To develop concepts and skills in compositing and editing
4. To understand the trends and development in animation effects
5. To develop the ability to propose and execute a post-production project
